lt.infobalt.itakademija.javalang.exam.socialnetwork

Interface SocialNetwork


  • public interface SocialNetwork
    A common interface for social networks.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addFriend(Friend friend)
      Method which adds a friend to social network.
      Collection<Friend> findByCity(String city)
      Find friends by city they live in.
      Friend findFriend(String firstName, String lastName)
      Finds a friend by first name and last name.
      int getNumberOfFriends()
      Gets number of friends in a network.
      Collection<Friend> getOrderedFriends()
      Order all friends alphabetically by city, lastName and then firstName.

    • Method Detail

      • addFriend

        void addFriend(Friend friend)
        Method which adds a friend to social network. It does not add the same friend twice or a null friend.
        Parameters:
        friend - a friend to be added. Cannot be null.

      • getNumberOfFriends

        int getNumberOfFriends()
        Gets number of friends in a network.
        Returns:
        number of friends. 0 if no friends exist.

      • findFriend

        Friend findFriend(String firstName,
                String lastName)
                  throws FriendNotFoundException
        Finds a friend by first name and last name.
        Parameters:
        firstName - friend's first name.
        lastName - friend's last name.
        Returns:
        a found friend. Never null.
        Throws:
        FriendNotFoundException - if no friend could be found by given parameters.

      • findByCity

        Collection<Friend> findByCity(String city)
        Find friends by city they live in.
        Parameters:
        city - to look friends in.
        Returns:
        a Collection with all Friends who were found in a city.

      • getOrderedFriends

        Collection<Friend> getOrderedFriends()
        Order all friends alphabetically by city, lastName and then firstName. I.e., if cities differ, then order by them, if not, then try to order by lastName. If they are also the same, order by firstName.
        Returns:
        ordered Collection of Friends
